welcome.heading: The power of lightning in your browser

intro.send_description: Lightning transactions happen all in your browser. No alt+tab or QR-code scanning needed.
intro.paywall_description: Define individual budgets for websites to enable seamless payment streams. No more annoying paywalls.
intro.privacy_description: Use lightning to authenticate and control your privacy.
intro.foss_description: Completely open code that can be audited by anyone. No stats or trackers. You are in control.

set_password.title: Protect your wallet
set_password.description: Your wallet is securely encrypted with a password and needs to be unlocked before usage.
set_password.confirm_password_label: Let's confirm you typed it correct:

test_connection.tutorial: Now you‚Äôve connected your node would you like to go through a tutorial?
test_connection.initializing: Initializing your account. Please wait, this can take a minute...
test_connection.connection_taking_long: Trying to connect takes longer than expected... Are your details correct? Is your node reachable?
test_connection.contact_support: If you need help please contact support@getalby.com

actions.delete_edit_account: Delete invalid account and edit again

choose_connector.title: Do you have a lightning wallet?
choose_connector.description: You need to first connect to a lightning wallet so that you can interact with your favorite websites that accept bitcoin lightning payments!

alby.title: Alby Wallet
alby.description: Create or login to your Alby account

pre_connect.title: Your Alby Lightning Wallet
pre_connect.login_account: Create or login to your Alby account.
pre_connect.host_wallet: We host a Lightning wallet for you!

optional_lightning_note.part1: Your Alby account also comes with an optional
optional_lightning_note.part3: . This is a simple way for anyone to send you Bitcoin on the Lightning Network.

lnd.title: LND
lnd.page_description: You need your node URL and a macaroon with read and send permissions (e.g. admin.macaroon)
lnd.drag_and_drop: Drag and drop your macaroon here or <0>browse</0>

errors.connection_failed: Connection failed. Are your LND credentials correct?

lndhub.title: LNDHub (Bluewallet)
lndhub.description: Connect to your Bluewallet mobile wallet
lndhub.page_description: In BlueWallet, choose the wallet you want to connect, open it, click on "...", click on Export/Backup to display the QR code and scan it with your webcam.

errors.connection_failed: Connection failed. Is your LNDHub URI correct?
